name: Special Forces: Operation Blood II
overview: Special Forces: Operation Blood II, a first person shooter, is the sequel of Operation Blood. This time the mission starts during the holidays of Captain Gamow. The game is based on the targeting of sight enemies on the screen. The player may use a rifle, grenades, and power ups falling on a parachute. During the fight with the enemy, such as soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, player has be wary of hostages, civilians or paramedics. Mission is undefined. Players must kill all enemies and survive. Two versions of the game exists, difference being whether the game should be played with joystick or light gun.
